author: Lydia Smith
title: China's Airline Passengers Are Returning Quickly to the Skies as Officials Ease Coronavirus Restrictions
description: The daily transported air passenger numbers rose 7.9 percent this month from March, the Civil Aviation Administration of China said on Wednesday.
content:
The number of passengers flying on China's airlines have risen this month, as the country lifts its stringent lockdown restrictions.
